body_html:
@mcarilli Per @pietern 's comment above, it might be the only incompatibility, but I haven't tested.

Is there a better/blessed way to check which backend is currently in use?

I'm also curious about that too. Maybe @pietern or @teng-li can tell us more.

I do see a place where torch.cuda.nccl is accessed in an apparently unchecked way).

That line looks weird to me as well.

body:
@mcarilli Per @pietern 's comment above, it might be the only incompatibility, but I haven't tested.

> Is there a better/blessed way to check which backend is currently in use?

I'm also curious about that too. Maybe @pietern or @teng-li can tell us more.

> I do see a place where torch.cuda.nccl is accessed in an apparently unchecked way).

That line looks weird to me as well.
